checks.rule: Document type appropriateness for SAFE_REPURCHASE workflow
checks.reason: Document type 'repurchase-safe-board-consent' is appropriate for SAFE_REPURCHASE workflow

checks.rule: Board consent execution requirement for SAFE repurchase
checks.reason: Board consent is executed with signature from Director 'Himanshu2' dated Dec 01, 2025

checks.rule: Board approval of repurchase and repurchase amount
checks.reason: Board consent includes approval clause for repurchase of SAFE to 'himanshu' for $25,000.00
All key clauses present: repurchase approval, authorization to execute, general authorization, ratification, and board determination

checks.rule: SAFE Repurchase and Cancellation Agreement execution
checks.reason: Document only shows board consent. Per knowledge base, repurchase is only effective when both parties sign the SAFE Repurchase and Cancellation Agreement, which is not present
Effective date (December 1, 2025) is after SAFE issuance date (November 24, 2025) and matches document creation date
Both original SAFE principal ($50,000.00) and repurchase price ($25,000.00) are clearly specified

safe_repurchase_clauses.repurchase_approval: The repurchase and cancellation of the SAFE issued to himanshu for a repurchase price of $25,000.00 is hereby approved
safe_repurchase_clauses.authorization_to_execute: Officers are authorized to execute and deliver a SAFE Repurchase and Cancellation Agreement with the Investor
safe_repurchase_clauses.general_authorization: Officers are authorized to take all actions necessary to effectuate the repurchase and cancellation of the SAFE
safe_repurchase_clauses.ratification: Any prior actions taken by officers in furtherance of the repurchase are ratified and approved
safe_repurchase_clauses.board_determination: The Board has determined that such repurchase is in the best interests of the Company and its stockholders

extracted_data.consent_type: Unanimous Written Consent of the Board of Directors

message: Board consent document is properly executed and contains all required approvals for SAFE repurchase. However, this represents only the first step in the repurchase process. The repurchase will not be effective until both the company and investor execute the SAFE Repurchase and Cancellation Agreement. The board has authorized officers to execute this agreement, but the actual bilateral execution is still pending.
